modShortDescription: This mod adds a new ammo type to the blunderbuss called blunderbussBall. It uses a solid lead ball instead of pebbles.
modDescription:
This mod adds a new [ammo](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-ammo/) type to the blunderbuss called blunderbussBall. It uses a solid lead ball instead of pebbles. The ball is crafted in the forge, and the ammo is made at the workbench.

**[Download](https://github.com/wtk34Mods/blunderbuss_ammo/archive/master.zip)**

**Credits:** [wtk34](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/wtk34/)
